successes.title: OLIVERS: The Last Pair of Athletic Shorts You'll Ever Need
successes.description: Your old, baggy gym shorts just got re-invented. We've created a refined and functional short to take you all over.

Pledges.description: Thanks guys. The support is appreciated. We'll send you some OLIVERS stickers, plus we'll give you a high five and a hug next time we see you on the street. You'll also be kept up-to-date on the latest at OLIVERS.
You'll get a limited edition keychain, made with our friends at DSPTCH using the OLIVERS signature MIL-SPEC paracord. A rugged, functional accessory.
You'll get your choice of 1 pair of OLIVERS shorts from the original collection. 29% off retail price ($68).
You'll get your choice of 2 pairs of OLIVERS shorts from the original collection. 35% off retail price ($136).
You'll get all 3 pairs of OLIVERS shorts from the original collection. 42% off retail price ($204).
3 pairs of OLIVERS Shorts (42% off retail price), limited edition keychain plus:
